attributes.action: Legislate for cyclists using roads to pay road tax.
attributes.background: Due to the recent changes in the UK highway code, this petition asks that the UK Government legislate to make it lawful for all cyclists using any roads in the UK to pay road tax, be insured in case of accident and collision with other road users, and hold a license to ride on the road.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607217
